attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Can anyone/political party be so guilty of total inactivity other than tax raising???
Add to this their plans for taxing your rubbish (inviting fly tipping/dumping in neighbors bins etc,,); Taxing motoring by the mile/per hour to the extent of making it an elitist pursuit, who cares about; the disabled/low income/fixed income pensioners etc..
More to their shame; before this idea was proffered ... was there any trial of multiple occupancy lanes on Motorways? This in spite of criticism from their own commissioned reports for failing to conduct such trials?
The vastly increased tax burden on the people of the UK as a result of this Government's failures to address the issues it promised to do, simply proves it's own inadequacies .... Vote Them Out!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
